descriptionHtml:
Macht der Flüsse is a blacksmith, who is a mix of German and Norwegian.

We're all tired of looking for people in Tamriel who don't sell ALL types of ingots, as it REALLY does annoy me. I present to you, Elvane the blacksmith.

He sells all types of ingots, ranging from gold ingots, to quicksilver ingots. He carries an abundant amount of each ingot, not to mention he'll buy almost anything you have revolving around weapons, ingots, bows, arrows, etc.

V1 - He only carries ingots, as I want to see how well this goes beforehand.

Location - Frozen Hearthfire Cellar

Working hours - 8 A.M - 4 P.M

(Macht der Flusse is German, meaning power of the rivers.)
author: BugPDiddy
